profile-description: AI & Data Solutions Engineer with expertise in architecting end-to-end solutions that integrate Web Development, AI, and Data Engineering. Passionate about transforming complex data into actionable insights and AI-driven automation leveraging modern web technologies, cloud services, and machine learning.

about-me.para1: Passionate about building intelligent, scalable, and impact-driven solutions, combining AI, big data, and cloud technologies. Experienced in developing high-performance web applications, engineering robust ETL pipelines, and deploying machine learning models that enhance automation and decision-making.
about-me.para2: Currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Engineering at New York University, specializing in Big Data, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing. Actively seeking Summer 2025 internship opportunities in the U.S. to apply advanced technical expertise in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
about-me.para3: Previously contributed as a Big Data & Backend Engineer at a leading Data & AI consulting firm Infocepts, collaborating with NBC Universal Media to develop AI-powered chatbots, optimize large-scale ETL workflows, and migrate data pipelines to AWS serverless architecture. As a Co-founder of an innovation initiative, AR Counsultancy Services, spearheaded the development of smart inventory systems, multilingual translation tools, and led cross-functional teams to deliver real-world AI and data solutions while mentoring aspiring engineers.
about-me.para4: Deeply committed to solving complex engineering challenges through scalable architectures, intelligent automation, and cutting-edge AI integration. Always looking to collaborate on high-impact projects at the intersection of data, AI, and software engineering.

1.name: Churn Predictor
1.description: A Churn Prediction Machine Learning Pipeline achieving 96.3% accuracy, designed to proactively reduce churn by delivering personalized incentives and targeted offers.

2.name: AI-Powered Intelligent Assistant
2.description: An all-in-one web application leveraging NLP, machine learning, and OpenAI services to enable automated document workflows, intelligent knowledge retrieval, and secure role-based access, enhancing operational efficiency and decision intelligence.

3.name: Metadata-Driven Data Pipeline Manager
3.description: A dynamic web service automating data pipeline orchestration, management, and sharing across Snowflake, S3, Databricks and other data warehouses, enhancing efficiency and scalability.

4.name: Abhishek Agrawal's Portfolio
4.description: A portfolio website built with a modern tech stack, featuring an intuitive interface to showcase my projects, skills, and experiences, with seamless navigation and optimized performance.

5.name: Store Management System
5.description: A metadata-driven web application integrated with RFID technology, enabling real-time tracking, automated stock updates, and enhanced security for efficient inventory management.

6.name: Multilingual Transliterator
6.description: A metadata-driven web application integrated with RFID technology, enabling real-time tracking, automated stock updates, and enhanced security for efficient inventory management.
